RecruitmentRequisitionPtcp.name: RecruitmentRequisitionPtcp
RecruitmentRequisitionPtcp.description: Represents information about a user or group of participants who have access to a recruitment requisition.

Comments.description: The comments about why the participant has access to the recruitment requisition.

IsActive.description: Specifies whether the participant's association with the recruitment requisition is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the recruitment requisition participant record.

ParticipantId.description: The participant associated with the recruitment requisition participant record.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The participant role associated with the recruitment requisition participant record.

RecruitmentRequisitionId.description: The recruitment requisition associated with the recruitment requisition participant record.
